history.title: Added login by password and added more questions
changes: UX: Added option login by password instead of magic link every time
Questions: Added all questions from M24 and M25 subfolder of goddisk, "Medicine Final MB SAQ By topic up to 2017". If year of question is unparsable by program, labeled as M55.
Bugfix: Fixed answer inaccuracy in M05-Q13 respiratory medicine question
System: Backend upgrades to solution tracking and progress saving.

history.title: Sort by oldest and suggestions for improvements
changes: UX: Added option to sort questions by oldest first
Feature: Added suggestion button for users to suggest improvements or new features

history.title: Confirmation dialog for unmarking question as done
changes: UX: Unchecking a question as "Done" previously wiped your notes instantly. We added a safety confirmation dialog to ensure you never lose your study notes or scores by accident again
System: Backend upgrades to user management and onboarding flows.

history.title: SAQ Improvements & Progress Panel
changes: Feature: Added progress panel to see progress over all topics at a glance
Feature: Added text input box for Short Answer Questions (SAQ) that saves to DB
Feature: Implemented SAQ point scoring and score tracking
Cosmetics: Question cards now show total marks scored for completed questions
UX: Removed intrusive notes popup for MCQ; Notes button now changes color to indicate if notes exist

history.title: Add feature to see all notes taken
changes: Feature: Added Notes panel to see all notes taken in one place, filter by topic and subtopic, as well as expanding card to see original question

history.title: Add feature to see performance by topic
changes: Feature: Added stats button to see performance by topic and subtopic
Bugfix: Minor fix to improve progress bar vsuals at the top of the screen

history.title: Minor AI Fix
changes: Bugfix: Fixed minor issue with AI analysis not returning results in some cases

history.title: Questions fix
changes: Major Update: Added detailed AI analysis if requested using Gemini 2.5 Flash. Better models need money sorry
Feature: Added caching for AI analysis to reduce costs and speed up response time

history.title: Questions fix
changes: Questions: Minor fix to questions with incorrectly labeled question type (ie. MCQ vs SAQ)
Announcement: Some questions have no answer. Maybe people remembered the MCQ options incorrectly so no correct answer.

history.title: Added search feature and improved UI
changes: Feature: Added search function to quickly find a question by specific words
Refactor: Improved UI - collapsable filter menu, show question count in each filter, store filter selections and scroll position

history.title: Update notes, bug fix, and flag
changes: Bugfix: on unable to update notes
Feature: Added flag to questions for review later
Feature: Added search function to quickly find a question by specific words
Questions: Added all questions from M25 Superpass. Removed duplicates

history.title: Version History & Auto-Update
changes: Added Version History page to track app changes.
Implemented Auto-Update system to force reload on new deployments.
Allow for note taking on questions, record scores achieved for each question.

history.title: Initial Release
changes: Launched Question Bank with MCQ and SAQ support.
Added all questions from Matthew Cheung superpass
Added filter by Topic and Subtopic, login features to save progress.
